title: LISTEN: Premier League Live podcast - Brighton v Chelsea
description: Kelly Cates is joined by Thierry Henry and Jamie Redknapp to reflect on Chelsea's 4-0 win over Brighton.
content: An inspired performance from Eden Hazard helped Chelsea back to winning ways in the Premier League with a comprehensive 4-0 victory against Brighton at the Amex Stadium.Henry and Redknapp were on hand to discuss the major talking points, including Hazard's brilliant individual performance.Click here to listen to the Premier League Live podcastNever miss an episode by subscribing via iTunes.
